thread.title: New Modern Facility near SFO
thread.title_full: New Modern Facility near SFO - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Fred M
title: New Modern Facility near SFO
text: Everything about this Hyatt is what you would expect from a well run new facility. Clean and quite large. My only only nit picky comment would be that walk from the elevator to the far side rooms is a bit long and that in all the modern design elements it is a bit stark. But would definitely be back. Great staff ready to help.
